sentences.english: My few months of married life with Helen had been so much lotus eating.
sentences.chinese: 在和海伦度蜜月的些许时光全都被我用来胡吃海塞了。

sentences.english: One of several such gatherings before, Hu eat "Ongoing nonsense true."
sentences.chinese: 一如此前的几次聚会，胡吃海塞胡扯瞎掰。

definition: to eat and drink gluttonously/to pig out
to eat and drink as much as one likes/to make a pig of oneself
to gobble up/to gorge oneself on (food)
dishes with generous amounts of meat and fish/lavish meal
to eat and drink/food and drink
to chew on a large slab (idiom); a large mouthful is hard to chew/to tuck into a great meal
to eat and eat/to stuff oneself
to wolf down one's food (idiom); to devour ravenously/to gorge oneself
